fitnesse.slim

Interface Converter<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BooleanArrayConverter, BooleanConverter, CharConverter, DateConverter, DoubleArrayConverter, DoubleConverter, EnumConverter, IntConverter, IntegerArrayConverter, ListConverter, PropertyEditorConverter, StringArrayConverter, StringConverter, VoidConverter

    public interface Converter<T>
    Slim is all strings at the interface. So we need converters that will map strings to types and types back to strings. Each derivative of this interface corresponds to a particular type.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      String toString(T o)
